verses.text: \w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H1931"\w* \w account|strong="H8435"\w* \w of|strong="H8435"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* (\w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, Edom).

\w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* wives \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*: \w Adah|strong="H5711"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Elon \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w*, Oholibamah \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Anah|strong="H6034"\w* \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w granddaughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Zibeon|strong="H6649"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Hivite|strong="H2340"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w Basemath|strong="H1315"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w and|strong="H1323"\w* sister \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Nebaioth|strong="H5032"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6215"\w* \w Adah|strong="H5711"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* Eliphaz \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, \w Basemath|strong="H1315"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w Reuel|strong="H7467"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* Oholibamah \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jeush|strong="H3274"\w*, \w Jalam|strong="H3281"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*. These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.

Later, \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wives \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \w along|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w livestock|strong="H4735"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* animals, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w property|strong="H7075"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3290"\w* \w acquired|strong="H7408"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* moved \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w far|strong="H5315"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brother \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w possessions|strong="H7399"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w too|strong="H3162"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*; \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w where|strong="H4033"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w support|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w livestock|strong="H4735"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3427"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* (\w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, Edom) \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w area|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*.

This \w is|strong="H6215"\w* \w the|strong="H2022"\w* \w account|strong="H8435"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, \w the|strong="H2022"\w* father \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H2022"\w* \w Edomites|strong="H8165"\w*, \w in|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H2022"\w* \w area|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: Eliphaz \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*’s wife \w Adah|strong="H5711"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Reuel|strong="H7467"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*’s wife \w Basemath|strong="H1315"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliphaz \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w Teman|strong="H8487"\w*, Omar, \w Zepho|strong="H6825"\w*, \w Gatam|strong="H1609"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kenaz|strong="H7073"\w*.

Additionally, \w Timna|strong="H8555"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w* Eliphaz, \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*. These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w grandsons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*’s wife \w Adah|strong="H5711"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Reuel|strong="H7467"\w*: \w Nahath|strong="H5184"\w*, \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*, \w Shammah|strong="H8048"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Mizzah|strong="H4199"\w*. They \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w grandsons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*’s wife \w Basemath|strong="H1315"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*’s wife Oholibamah (\w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Anah|strong="H6034"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w granddaughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zibeon|strong="H6649"\w*) whom she \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*: \w Jeush|strong="H3274"\w*, \w Jalam|strong="H3281"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* chiefs \w among|strong="H1060"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*. \w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliphaz \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*: Chiefs \w Teman|strong="H8487"\w*, Omar, \w Zepho|strong="H6825"\w*, \w Kenaz|strong="H7073"\w*,

\w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, \w Gatam|strong="H1609"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*. They \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* chiefs \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliphaz \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Edom, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* they \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w grandsons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Adah|strong="H5711"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Reuel|strong="H7467"\w*: Chiefs \w Nahath|strong="H5184"\w*, \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*, \w Shammah|strong="H8048"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Mizzah|strong="H4199"\w*. They \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* chiefs \w descended|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Reuel|strong="H7467"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Edom, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* they \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w grandsons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*’s wife \w Basemath|strong="H1315"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*’s wife Oholibamah: Chiefs \w Jeush|strong="H3266"\w*, \w Jalam|strong="H3281"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*. They \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* chiefs \w descended|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*’s wife Oholibamah, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Anah|strong="H6034"\w*.

All \w these|strong="H1931"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* (\w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, Edom), \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* their chiefs.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w Horite|strong="H2752"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* land: \w Lotan|strong="H3877"\w*, \w Shobal|strong="H7732"\w*, \w Zibeon|strong="H6649"\w*, \w Anah|strong="H6034"\w*,

\w Dishon|strong="H1787"\w*, Ezer, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dishan|strong="H1789"\w*. They \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* chiefs \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Horites|strong="H2752"\w*, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Edom.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Lotan|strong="H3877"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w Hori|strong="H2753"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hemam|strong="H1967"\w*. \w Timna|strong="H8555"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w Lotan|strong="H3877"\w*’s sister.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shobal|strong="H7732"\w*: \w Alvan|strong="H5935"\w*, \w Manahath|strong="H4506"\w*, \w Ebal|strong="H5858"\w*, \w Shepho|strong="H8195"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Onam.

\w These|strong="H1931"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zibeon|strong="H6649"\w*: Aiah \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Anah|strong="H6034"\w*. (\w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w Anah|strong="H6034"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w hot|strong="H3222"\w* \w springs|strong="H3222"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w pasturing|strong="H7462"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H4672"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zibeon|strong="H6649"\w*.)

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Anah|strong="H6034"\w*: \w Dishon|strong="H1787"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Oholibamah \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Anah|strong="H6034"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Dishon: \w Hemdan|strong="H2533"\w*, Eshban, \w Ithran|strong="H3506"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Cheran|strong="H3763"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ezer: \w Bilhan|strong="H1092"\w*, \w Zaavan|strong="H2190"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Akan|strong="H6130"\w*.
These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dishan|strong="H1789"\w*: \w Uz|strong="H5780"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Aran.

These are \w the|strong="H7732"\w* chiefs of \w the|strong="H7732"\w* \w Horites|strong="H2752"\w*: Chiefs \w Lotan|strong="H3877"\w*, \w Shobal|strong="H7732"\w*, \w Zibeon|strong="H6649"\w*, \w Anah|strong="H6034"\w*,

\w Dishon|strong="H1787"\w*, Ezer, \w and|strong="H1787"\w* \w Dishan|strong="H1789"\w*. They are \w the|strong="H8165"\w* chiefs of \w the|strong="H8165"\w* Horites, according \w to|strong="H8165"\w* their divisions in \w the|strong="H8165"\w* land of \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*.

\w These|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Edom \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w any|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H4427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*:

\w Bela|strong="H1106"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H4427"\w* Edom; \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H4427"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Dinhabah|strong="H1838"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bela|strong="H1106"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Jobab|strong="H3103"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bozrah|strong="H1224"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*.

When \w Jobab|strong="H3103"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Husham|strong="H2367"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* land \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w Temanites|strong="H8489"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1121"\w* \w Husham|strong="H2367"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bedad, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w defeated|strong="H5221"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w country|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Avith|strong="H5762"\w*.

When \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Samlah|strong="H8072"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w Masrekah|strong="H4957"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*.

When \w Samlah|strong="H8072"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Shaul|strong="H7586"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w Rehoboth|strong="H7344"\w* \w on|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H5104"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shaul|strong="H7586"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Baal-hanan|strong="H1177"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Achbor|strong="H5907"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1121"\w* \w Baal-hanan|strong="H1177"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Achbor|strong="H5907"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Hadad|strong="H1924"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*. \w His|strong="H8478"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Pau|strong="H6464"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* wife’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Mehetabel|strong="H4105"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Matred|strong="H4308"\w*, \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Me-zahab.

These \w are|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*’s chiefs, according \w to|strong="H4725"\w* their \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w and|strong="H4725"\w* regions, \w by|strong="H8034"\w* their \w names|strong="H8034"\w*: Chiefs \w Timna|strong="H8555"\w*, \w Alvah|strong="H5933"\w*, \w Jetheth|strong="H3509"\w*,
Oholibamah, Elah, \w Pinon|strong="H6373"\w*,
\w Kenaz|strong="H7073"\w*, \w Teman|strong="H8487"\w*, \w Mibzar|strong="H4014"\w*,

\w Magdiel|strong="H4025"\w*, \w and|strong="H6215"\w* \w Iram|strong="H5902"\w*. \w These|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H6215"\w* \w the|strong="H1931"\w* chiefs \w of|strong="H4186"\w* Edom, according to their \w settlements|strong="H4186"\w* \w in|strong="H4186"\w* \w the|strong="H1931"\w* land \w they|strong="H1931"\w* possessed. \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H1931"\w* father \w of|strong="H4186"\w* \w the|strong="H1931"\w* Edomites.
